bibl.title: Riesame di P. Princ. III 115: "Philosophical treatise (?)"
bibl.seg: Valeria Piano, Riesame di P. Princ. III 115: "Philosophical treatise (?)".

Re-examination of P. Princ. III, 115 recto and verso (= MP3 2607; LDAB 5133). Provides a new papyrological description of the piece and a commented re-edition of both the texts preserved one on the recto (documentary) and the other on the verso (philosophical?).
bibl.note: Re-examination of P. Princ. III, 115 recto and verso (= MP3 2607; LDAB 5133). Provides a new papyrological description of the piece and a commented re-edition of both the texts preserved one on the recto (documentary) and the other on the verso (philosophical?).
